sentences.sContent: When Jesus had entered Capernaum, a centurion came to him, asking for help.
sentences.sContent_eng: When Jesus had entered Capernaum, a centurion came to him, asking for help.
sentences.sCn: 耶稣进了迦百农，有一个百夫长前来求助。

sentences.sContent: When Jesus had entered Capernaum, a centurion came to him, asking for help.
sentences.sContent_eng: When Jesus had entered Capernaum, a centurion came to him, asking for help.
sentences.sCn: 耶稣进了迦百农，有一个百夫长进前来，求他说。

sentences.sContent: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum, there came unto him a centurion, beseeching him.
sentences.sContent_eng: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum, there came unto him a centurion, beseeching him.
sentences.sCn: 耶稣进了迦百农，有一个百夫长进前来，求他说。

trans.tranOther: an army officer of ancient Rome, who was in charge of about 100 soldiers
